attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned petition the prime minister, to save our heritage.namely a 13th century building called belgrave st peters church.
it is situated in a conservation area of the old part of leicester.

rejection.details: A more appropriate route for action is to pursue the planning process and appeal if necessary. If you have already done so please feel free to resubmit your petition.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
